name: calcFINA.js
description:
calcFINA is a project I started a while ago. calcFINA was originally  coded using BASIC, a very "basic" coding language commonly used to make programs on the commodore64. I spent months getting it to work... AND THAT ONLY HAD 6 OPERATIONS: adding, subtracting, multiplying, division, square root, and exponents.

FUN FACT: calcFINA was named after the save that i made of the original calculator, it was going to be "calculator final", but the computer i was using had an 8 character limit, so i named it calcFINA.

BUT THIS IS calcFINA.js A more advanced version of that original project...

Sadly, calcFINA 1 was coded on an old computer that required batteries to save work. So when the batteries got knocked loose, the project was lost forever, so calcFINA 1 is lost to time, unable to ever be found. I may recode it someday, but for now...

calcFINA.JS IS BEING MADE!
